              LAWRENCE
text:
Will
               
              watch
               
              thy
               
              waking
              ,
               
              and
               
              that
               
              very
               
              night

speaker:
FRIAR
               
              LAWRENCE
text:
Shall
               
              Romeo
               
              bear
               
              thee
               
              hence
               
              to
               
              Mantua
              .

speaker:
FRIAR
               
              LAWRENCE
text:
And
               
              this
               
              shall
               
              free
               
              thee
               
              from
               
              this
               
              present
               
              shame
              ,

speaker:
FRIAR
               
              LAWRENCE
text:
If
               
              no
               
              inconstant
               
              toy
               
              nor
               
              womanish
               
              fear

speaker:
FRIAR
               
              LAWRENCE
text:
Abate
               
              thy
               
              valor
               
              in
               
              the
               
              acting
               
              it
              .

speaker: JULIET
text:
Give
               
              me
              ,
               
              give
               
              me
              !
               
              O
              ,
               
              tell
               
              not
               
              me
               
              of
               
              fear
              !

speaker:
FRIAR
               
              LAWRENCE
text:
Hold
              ,
               
              get
               
              you
               
              gone
              .
               
              Be
               
              strong
               
              and
               
              prosperous

speaker:
FRIAR
               
              LAWRENCE
text:
In
               
              this
               
              resolve
              .
               
              I’ll
               
              send
               
              a
               
              friar
               
              with
               
              speed

speaker:
FRIAR
               
              LAWRENCE
text:
To
               
              Mantua
               
              with
               
              my
               
              letters
               
              to
               
              thy
               
              lord
              .

speaker: JULIET
text:
Love
               
              give
               
              me
               
              strength
              ,
               
              and
               
              strength
               
              shall
               
              help
               
              afford
              .

speaker: JULIET
text:
Farewell
              ,
               
              dear
               
              father
              .
